website_summaries.verdict: Many CFA exam candidates will find these exclusive insights into previous test results very useful. More of a test-taking strategy guide than a study guide, however.
pros: Authors analyzed previous CFA exam results to prepare new strategies
Contains useful demographic information and pass-fail rates on test takers
cons: Contains charts and graphs, but little actual test content

customer_reviews.title: Awful book, insubstantial material, complete scam. do not buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This book is awful. it has nothing substantial in terms of helping you prep for CFA. everything it describes is common knowledge and I just can't believe how many paid upvotes there are. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamster

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful Resource
customer_reviews.text: I have read the 3rd Edition to the 300 Hours CFA Exam Insights and can honestly say that it is a must have in my preparation for what are (in my opinion) without question the most difficult finance examinations. The book contains all of 300 Hours' "analytics, conclusions and learnings" from a large sample of exam results, focusing on areas such as the make up of each of the CFA exams and which topics to focus on, to how much practice each student should be prepared to do in hopes of being successful. I am sure that this update only brings more helpful insights. I highly recommend this book to anyone who is serious about successfully completing the CFA program.
customer_reviews.author: Tribeca

customer_reviews.title: Helpful & Insightful Data
customer_reviews.text: This product helped me focus and feel confident about my strategy heading into Level I and II. The data is unique to 300 Hours and provided a few crucial tips for the exams. At the end of the day I thought it helped address my pain points in a concise and digestible fashion. I have already recommended this product to my friends/co-workers and do the same for you!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kawasaki

customer_reviews.title: Everything else you need to know to pass the CFA exams other than the CFA Curriculum!
customer_reviews.text: The information here is awesome! This will save you countless hours pouring through the website to glean every tidbit of information. It is collected here in an easy to use format and well organized no matter what level you are taking. The tips and tricks I learned here helped me to pass the first level and I have a good start on Level II. I plan to re-read it again before I start Level III.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Useful and insightful
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly useful read. The book explains not only which areas to focus on, but also the strategy to apply on exam day. As we all know, after 300 hours of preparation, it all boils down to 1 day. The data and analysis speaks for itself. If you want to study for the CFA exams (or are busy studying at the moment), I strongly suggest you read this to optimize your strategy.
customer_reviews.author: Pranav

customer_reviews.title: Unique set of data, moderately useful
customer_reviews.text: Useful set of data on the CFA exams, including pass rates and some demographic information on test-takers. The insight is well-organized and not widely available, so the effort to collect and communicate the information is fantastic. The report could be improved with additional information and deeper analytics as newer editions are released (which happens each year). A reader should expect to get high-level insight into who took the test, whether they passed or failed, and which areas to focus on. She should not expect to get some world-changing secret on how to pass.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great place to start!!
customer_reviews.text: This book has a wealth of information in one place that assists you in understanding the CFA exam and what it is about (descriptions, stats, charts, etc.). If you are interested in pursuing the CFA designation, this resource is an excellent starting point!!
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: If you are even thinking about taking the CFA exam ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are even thinking about taking the CFA exam, are retaking a level or are thinking about pushing ahead to the next level exam, YOU MUST BUY THIS! It is worth every penny spent with regard to the information it provides. It won't get you from failing to passing. What it will do is give you insight, order and an ability to plan ahead through the rough waters of the CFA exams.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Villacampa

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone looking for some transparency into the CFA ...
customer_reviews.text: This book was really helpful in figuring out where to dedicate my time in the final weeks leading up to the exam. Would recommend to anyone looking for some transparency into the CFA grading and results.
customer_reviews.author: ETS

customer_reviews.title: This analysis is an outstanding compilation of data. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This analysis is an outstanding compilation of data. I have used a prior version to guide my studies to focus on topics proven to be more difficult across candidates from one year to the other. Definitely worth a read.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Tart

customer_reviews.title: Great extension of their website material
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful in identifying the key routines to get you on the passing track. The 3rd edition was a great extension of the 300hours.com website where they provide all sorts of useful tips!
customer_reviews.author: James Holleran

customer_reviews.title: Extremely detailed and insightful analysis of actual CFA candidates' experience ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely detailed and insightful analysis of actual CFA candidates' experience. This helped me understand the level of preparation required to pass.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I very much enjoyed the compilation of data with appropriate analysis for the CFA Exam results. As 300 hours is becoming more popular, their analysis becomes more and more relevant with every edition. I recommend reading this as a break from the study material, understanding what you are up against can give you great confidence in tackling the exams.
customer_reviews.author: JWB

customer_reviews.title: Great Information for helping to pass the CFA exam
customer_reviews.text: The book is filled with helpful data, notably how the test is scored and what fail bands look like. There is no real information on how the CFA exam is scored outside of this book, and the numerous charts and graphs help further illustrate the breakdown of how time spent studying correlates to passing the exam at all levels.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Resource
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic book with valuable information that can help you focus your examination preparation on the most valuable topics. In addition, there's a variety of good information on the exam formats themselves so that there are never any surprises on exam day. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good resource for developing a study strategy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good resource for developing a study strategy. The data is well organized and presented and I found it to be very helpful to understand the competitive landscape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: The previous versions of this book have assisted me greatly in my studies for the CFA exam. They provide unique perspectives and give useful tips to manage your time and focus your study efforts. I would recommend this for anyone taking the CFA exam, regardless of what level of the exam that you are on.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Nunley

customer_reviews.title: Good insights
customer_reviews.text: Well written and presented with great insights. using data that you cant find elsewhere to help you pin point areas to really focus on.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Soobaya

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful book in helping to structure my studies for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful book in helping to structure my studies for the massive body of knowledge required for each level of the exam. Having exam insights and tips from a professional has made a major difference in my studies.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Great materials
customer_reviews.text: I read a prior version of this and the authors at 300 Hours know their stuff. Their materials have always been helpful to me and I can't imagine this edition of their book will be anything but helpful to you.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G Rubin

product_meta.title: 300 Hours CFA Exam Insights: The one-of-a-kind CFA exam guide to give you an edge in passing your CFA exams
